name: MMORTS
description:
DayKnight 30-day project challenge!

It's an event to commit to a personal project for a month and share your goals, progress, and delays with a supportive community. It will run from April 4th to May 4th.

https://youtu.be/qAnWFjefDqw

Goal/Description: MMORTS. Dinosaurs, Robots and Humans battle it out in this exciting persistent world.

Week 1: Basic mechanics, Networking
Week 2: Art, Unit/Building balancing
Week 3: Map, AWS persistent data
Week 4: UI, Sound, Polish

Result: User login, deployment of persistent army, combat other players, gain control of global map areas, logout.

Day[1]: https://cl.ly/1O0E3A0f2d2H

Day[5]: Cloud backup and Mac OS reinstall
Day[6]: Unit stats database architecture
